web.description: Next.js App Router application - Pages, layouts, route handlers, server and client components. Adjust directories for your app structure.

ui.description: Shared UI components - Reusable React components, design system primitives, component library.

api.description: API routes and handlers - Next.js API routes (app/api), server actions, route handlers.

shared.description: Shared utilities and types - Type definitions, hooks, utilities, constants used across apps.

metadata.description: SkillMeat full-stack application with FastAPI backend and Next.js 15 frontend. Python backend in skillmeat/api, core logic in skillmeat/core, Next.js app in skillmeat/web. Supports symbols extraction for Python (FastAPI routes, services, repositories) and TypeScript (React Server/Client Components, hooks, utilities).
